column.name: type
column.text: 考勤类型 :100=正常上班 200=加班 300=请假

column.name: working_hours
column.text: 时长精确到小时，保留一个小数

column.name: shift_type
column.text: 班次类型:1=白班、2=中班、3=晚班、4=休息

column.name: leave_type
column.text: 请假类型:1=事假、2=病假、3=其他

statements.statement:
select * from bu_user_work_record where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( user_code = '${key}' , user_name = '${key}' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.userCode??> and user_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.userName??> and user_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userName)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and type = ${query.type} </#if>
<#if query.workingHours??> and working_hours = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.workingHours)}' </#if>
<#if query.shiftType??> and shift_type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.shiftType)}' </#if>
<#if query.leaveType??> and leave_type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.leaveType)}' </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.tenantCode??> and tenant_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
</#if>
